name: Sandy Lovely
description: I am a christian by Religion and also a Caring,Nice,Kind,Faithful,Loyal and God Fearing Woman.I am a fun loving person. I am a very caring and sensitive person, I am a level headed, down to earth person who is totally devoted to the one I love. I tend to be shy at first, but I will open up quickly with the right person. I am confident, calm, and happy. An introvert by nature, I am quiet, structured, and organized. i think I’m a pretty easy going person. I love to be shown affection and don’t have any problem whatsoever showing the right person lots of it, i always say if its better to give than to receive. I think that i have a pretty “strange” sense of humor at times. i look at it this way I’d rather make a joke than to sit around and dwell on things i can’t do much of anything about.. I literally despise people who put on or lie about things and think they can get away with it where I’m concerned. I consider myself a sensitive, kind, and gentle person who enjoys being with people. I like going to the movies, listening to music, taking long walks on the beach. Favorite activities are going to the movies,taking walks the beach, being healthy. Most of all I love to be romantic for that special someone.Well am very Romantic person…. i give all i can do to make a man to feel for me… i will always make him happy wont hurt him… i will never lie to him…
